body_html: I am facing the same problem. I suppose that is /job:ps/.. and /job:worker/.. on the same machine would be translated to /job:lcoalhost/....... But It still be translated to /job:localhost even your ps is another machine, so the saver.restore can not find the right ps==localhost . I am trying on freeze_graph function. PS.still have no success

body: I am facing the same problem. I suppose that is /job:ps/.. and /job:worker/.. on the same machine would be translated to /job:lcoalhost/....... But It still be translated to /job:localhost even your ps is another machine, so the saver.restore can not find the right ps==localhost . I am trying on freeze_graph function.
